    • arrayChanged

      void arrayChanged(int type, Object changedObject)
      Called whenever a hydrophone or streamer changes.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of change e.g. ArrayChangeListener.HYDROPHONE_CHANGE
      changedObject - - the changed object - hydrophone or streamer property.
